product.name: Groomed Cat
product.description: Friendly house cat keeps you away from the vacuum

product.name: Small Dogs
product.description: Great companion dog to sit on your lap

product.name: Exotic
product.description: Impress your friends with your colorful friend.

product.name: Small Fish
product.description: Fits nicely in a small aquarium.

item.name: Friendly Cat
item.description: This black and white colored cat is super friendly. Anyone passing by your front yard will find him puring at their feet and trying to make a new friend. His name is Anthony, but I call him Ant as a nickname since he loves to eat ants and other insects.

address.street1: W el Camino Real & Castro St

item.name: Fluffy Cat
item.description: A great pet for a hair stylist! Have fun combing Bailey's silver mane. Maybe trim his whiskers? He is very patient and loves to be pampered.

item.name: Sneaky Cat
item.description: My cat is so sneaky. He is so curious that he just has to poke his nose into everything going on in the house. Everytime I turn around, BAM, he is in the room peaking at what I am doing. Nothing escapes his keen eye. He should be a spy in the CIA!

address.street1: River Oaks Pky & Village Center Dr

item.name: Lazy Cat
item.description: A great pet to lounge on the sofa with. If you want a friend to watch TV with, this is the cat for you. Plus, she wont even ask for the remote! Really, could you ask for a better friend to lounge with?

address.street1: S 1st St & W Santa Clara St

item.name: Old Cat
item.description: A great old pet retired from duty in the circus. This fully-trained tiger is looking for a place to retire. Loves to roam free and loves to eat other animals.

item.name: Young Female cat
item.description: A great young pet to chase around. Loves to play with a ball of string. Bring some instant energy into your home.

item.name: Playful Female Cat
item.description: A needy pet. This cat refuses to grow up. Do you like playful spirits? I need lots of attention. Please do not leave me alone, not even for a minute.

address.street1: W el Camino Real & S Mary Ave

item.name: White Fluffy Cat
item.description: This fluffy white cat looks like a snowball. Plus, she likes playing outside in the snow and it looks really cool to see this snowball cat run around on the ski slopes. I hope you have white carpet as this cat sheds lots of hair.

item.name: Tiger Stripe Cat
item.description: This little tiger thinks it has big teeth. A great wild pet for an adventurous person. May eat your other pets so be careful- just kidding. This little tiger is affectionate.

item.name: Alley Cat
item.description: Meow Meow in the back alley cat fights! This cat keeps the racoons away, but still has class.

address.street1: W el Camino Real & Hollenbeck Ave

item.name: Speedy Cat
item.description: Fastest and coolest cat in town. If you always wanted to own a cheetah, this cat is even faster and better looking. No dog could ever catch this bolt of lightening.

item.name: Stylish Cat
item.description: A high maintenance cat for an owner with time. This cat needs pampering: comb it hair, brush its teeth, wash its fur, paint its claws. For all you debutantes, let the world know you have arrived in style with this snooty cat in your purse!

address.street1: Great Mall Pky & S Main St

item.name: Smelly Cat
item.description: A great pet with its own song to sing with your fiends. "Smelly cat, Smelly cat ..." Need an excuse for that funky odor in your house? Smelly cat is the answer.

item.name: Saber Cat
item.description: A great watch pet. Want to keep your roommates from stealing the beer from your refrigerator? This big-toothed crazy cat is better than a watchdog. Just place him on top of the refrigerator and watch him pounce when so-called friends try to sneak a beer. This cat is great fun at parties.

address.street1: S 1st St & W Santa Clara St

item.name: Sophisticated Cat
item.description: This cat is from Paris. It has a very distinguished history and is looking for a castle to play in. This sophisticated cat has class and taste. No chasing on string, no catnip habits. Only the habits of royalty in this cats blood.

item.name: Princess cat
item.description: Just beauty and elegance. She will charm you from the moment she enters the room.

item.name: Lazy cat
item.description: Wow! This cat is cool. It has a beautiful tan coat. I wish I could get a sun tan of that color.

item.name: Scapper male cat
item.description: A scappy cat that likes to cause trouble. If you are looking for a challenge to your cat training skills, this scapper is the test!

item.name: Lazy cat
item.description: Buy me please. I love to sleep.

item.name: Old Cat
item.description: A great old pet retired from duty in the circus. This fully-trained tiger is looking for a place to retire. Loves to roam free and loves to eat other animals.

item.name: Young Cat
item.description: A great young pet to chase around. Loves to play with a ball of string.

address.street1: Great Mall Pky & S Main St

item.name: Scrappy Cat
item.description: A real trouble-maker in the neighborhood. Looking for some T.L.C

item.name: Alley Cat
item.description: Loves to play in the alley outside my apartment, but looking for a warmer and safer place to spend its nights.

item.name: Playful Cat
item.description: Come play with me. I am looking for fun.

item.name: Long Haired Cat
item.description: Buy this fancy cat.

item.name: Fresh Cat
item.description: Just need a nice bath and i will be fresh as a kitten.

item.name: Wild Cat
item.description: This wild tiger loves to play.

item.name: Saber Cat
item.description: Buy me

address.street1: River Oaks Pky & Village Center Dr

item.name: Snappy Cat
item.description: Buy Me.

item.name: Pretty Dog
item.description: Just like a statue or work of art she is so pretty. If you are an artist this dog is a perfect subject for your portraits. She is such a poser! She belongs in Hollywood with her own star on the wlak of fame.

item.name: Beach Dog
item.description: A great dog to lay in the Sun with, chases a frisbee like a champ, and can swim like a shark. Heck, he can ride a surfboard if you dont mind sharing.

item.name: Scrapper Dog
item.description: This scrapy woofer needs some clean up and some lessons. Help him out and take him home.

item.name: Intense Worker Dog
item.description: My dog is full on energy and intensity. He needs a constant challenge to keep him happy. Great for a farm or house in the country. Bring him to work with you.

item.name: Old Dog
item.description: This old geezer just wants to sleep at your feet. Slip him some food under the table and watch him wag his tail. Great dog for someone who retired before the dot-com bubble burst. A partner to loaf with.

item.name: Female Huskie
item.description: Live in a cold area? This dog has her own winter jacket. She loves the snow. She even loves to eat the snow. One time, I saw her eat a whole snowman ...it was crazy fun to watch.

item.name: Rasta Dog
item.description: Hey mon! Want a dog to chill with. This dog wants the rasta life. You can see it in her eyes. The ocean, the sunshine, all you need is this dog to be complete.

item.name: Tough Dog
item.description: Need a guard dog? An excellent guard dog that would love to sit next to you and watch reruns of police shows on TV. And loves kids. Its like having a trusted babysitter to watch your kids and home.

item.name: Sad Puppy
item.description: Help to put a smile on the face of this puppy. What? You did not know dogs could smile? Well, see what happens when you drop some steak on the floor!

item.name: Speedy Dog
item.description: A great runner for a fast owner. This is the fastest dog I have ever seen. Its naturally fast and does not take steroids to improve its performance.

item.name: Young Dog
item.description: Ready to play! This young dog is eager to learn new tricks. Bring me home.

address.street1: River Oaks Pky & Village Center Dr

item.name: Sleepy Dog
item.description: This sleepy dog is perfect for a relaxed home. Plus she just seems to love old music. Anytime she is near an elevator, she just wags her tail waiting to hear that old music.

item.name: Lazy Dog
item.description: OK, I can not get this dog to fetch the newspaper. Not even for a doggy biscuit. His name is "Rhymes". He is so lazy, it drives me crazy.

item.name: Old Dog
item.description: This old geezer just wants to sleep at your feet. Slip him some food under the table and watch him wag his tail.

item.name: Young Dog
item.description: A great young pet in need of training.

item.name: Scrapper Dog
item.description: This scrapy woofer needs some clean up and some lessons. Help him out and take him home.

item.name: Grey Hound
item.description: A great runner for a fast owner. This is the fastest dog I have ever seen. Its naturally fast and does not take steroids to improve its performance.

item.name: Beach Dog
item.description: A great dog to lay in the Sun with, chases a frisbee like a champ, and can swim like a shark. Heck, he can ride a surfboard if you dont mind sharing.

address.street1: W el Camino Real & S Mary Ave

item.name: Sweet Parrot
item.description: This young little parrot is a great pet. It loves to sit on your finger, so you can where it just like a ring, but so much more exotic than a simple diamond.

item.name: Female Eclectus Parrot
item.description: This bird really loves apples. She is a great companion and is quite beautiful. Just look at those colors. The read and blue makes her look like superman! And she can fly too!

item.name: Galah Parrot
item.description: My Galah Parrot needs a new home. This new home should have lots of trees and absolutely NO cats. I dont say that because the cats might eat the bird. Rather, I say this Galah needs to stay away from cats so that the cats don't get hurt. This Galah loves the taste of cat meat.

item.name: Kookaburra Bird
item.description: Little Kookaburra for sale. This Kookaburra is tame and likes to just sit to tree branches. A very easy to care for pet.

item.name: Orange LoveBird
item.description: Can this love bird bring you some love? I believe this orange lovebird will bring good luck to your life, and for just a small fee it can be yours.

address.street1: River Oaks Pky & Village Center Dr

item.name: Blue Peacock
item.description: Buy a blue peacock and be the envy of all your neighbors! Guaranteed to turn heads. You will meet everyone in your neighborhood as they come by to see this beauty.

item.name: Wild Peacock
item.description: OK, this peacock is wild. And I dont mean that it is not tame. I mean this thing really likes to party! Its the best dancer I have ever seen. Trust me on this.

item.name: White Peacock
item.description: My white peacock is like a work of art. Its beauty is refreshing. Consider this an investment, just like buying a painting.

item.name: Rainbow Lorikeet
item.description: Color! Color! Color! The rainbow lorikeet is a beautiful bird.

address.street1: W el Camino Real & S Mary Ave

item.name: Stone Eagle
item.description: My eagle is really tough. He is like a rock! In fact he is made of stone. Ok, he may not have a heart and maybe he can not fly, but he needs no food and is so easy to care for. And he has a great temperament, and in fact we have never had any disagreements at all.

item.name: Red Macaw
item.description: Look at this majestic beauty! The colors of this macaw are breath-taking. In fact, the colors are so strong you should make sure the furniture in your home matches this bird, as this will be the center-piece of your lovely home.

item.name: Squaky Bird
item.description: A great noisy bird to drive your parents crazy. If you think playing a stereo loud will test your parents patience, wait till you try this screeching bird. It will fly around and cause a commotion that will have you laughing for days. This is a sure-fire way to get your parents to get you your own apartment.

item.name: Pink Bird
item.description: A beautiful pink bird. Its not white. Its not red. Its pink.

item.name: Wild Bird
item.description: A wild bird. This little rebel thinks its not a house pet, but really it is as tame as a lap dog. It just looks so wild and impresses your friends. Owning this wild bird is cooler than getting a tatoo and hurts less!

item.name: Really Wild Bird
item.description: A really wild pet. This thing is like a zombie in a horror movie it is so wild. I tried for 2 years to tame this beast and all that happened was I got peck marks all over my hands. Maybe you are a former circus trainer looking for a challenge? If so this birdy needs a home.

item.name: Crazy Bird
item.description: This crazy bird once flew over the cukoos nest. Some people say that I am crazy. Well, you should meet my bird if you want to meet crazy. This bird is plain looney.

address.street1: River Oaks Pky & Village Center Dr

item.name: Smart Bird
item.description: A great smart pet. Perfect for an engineer. This pet is so smart it can do your coding for you. Just dont tell your boss!

item.name: Funny Bird
item.description: A great funny pet. Ever hear the joke about a bird, a hacker, and Java book? Well, this bird can tell it to you. It will make you laugh until you cry. Plus, it can teach you jokes which you can use at parties to impress your friends. That is right sir, this bird will make even you funny!

address.street1: W el Camino Real & S Mary Ave

item.name: Active Bird
item.description: A great active pet. This bird once flew a marathon with me and did not get tired. It can fly along while you jog on the trails. Just make sure the hawks do not swoop down and eat it.

item.name: Curious Bird
item.description: A great curious birdy. Everything will pique this birds interest. It will investigate every new thing it sees.

item.name: Itchy Bird
item.description: This bird needs some attention. I think he has dandruff in his feathers. He is always scratching so I knick-named him "Itchy". I wish I had claws like that to scratch MY head. Maybe if you are a good trainer, you can teach him to scratch your back nicely with those talons.

item.name: Spotted JellyFish
item.description: Buy Me.

item.name: Small Sea Nettle JellyFish
item.description: Buy Me.

item.name: RockFish
item.description: Buy Me.

item.name: Purple JellyFish
item.description: Buy Me.

item.name: White Octopus
item.description: Buy Me.

item.name: Red Octopus
item.description: Buy Me.

address.street1: River Oaks Pky & Village Center Dr

item.name: Koi
item.description: I love this fish. But my new roommate has a cat, and the cat just so does not seem to get along with the fish. At first, I thought the cat was trying to just play with the fish, or maybe learn to swim. And then I remembered that show where they explained that Tuna is the chicken of the sea, but that does not mean its chicken. Not, its fish. And cats love tuna, so then I got scared and realized my fish is in danger. Help me! Buy my little chicken of the sea.

item.name: GlassFish
item.description: FREE! And open source! The best open source Java EE 5 application server project.

item.name: CuttleFish
item.description: This rare and spooky looking fish is the talk of town where I live!

item.name: Silver Carp Car
item.description: You will never believe the fish I caught! This is the ultimate fishing stories... seriously! I pulled this baby out of the forbidden lake behind the nuclear power plant.

item.name: Moon JellyFish
item.description: Buy Me.

item.name: Sea Anemone
item.description: This colorful sea anemone will really brighten up your aquarium.

item.name: Gold Fish
item.description: Perfect for a first fish for a child. This fish is not good in the same tank as some bigger fish as they see this little gold fish as a snack.

item.name: Angel Fish
item.description: I love this fish. But my new roommate has a cat, and the cat just so does not seem to get along with the fish. At first, I thought the cat was trying to just play with the fish, or maybe learn to swim. And then I remembered that show where they explained that Tuna is the chicken of the sea, but that does not mean its chicken. Not, its fish. And cats love tuna, so then I got scared and realized my fish is in danger. Help me! Buy my little chicken of the sea.

item.name: Striped Tropical
item.description: This large fish needs plenty of room to swim. Either a big aquarium or your bath tub.

item.name: Hawaiian Green Gecko
item.description: Oloha Wahine! I am from Hawaii. I like to hang out on leaves and just kick back at the beach. You know you can not resist my shiny green skin. So what do you say, want to come visit me?

item.name: African Spurred Tortoise
item.description: Many people get this as a pet, not realizing it will grow over time to be as large as an ottoman. I must confess, that I am one of those people. Which is why I am now trying to sell this tortoise -it is getting big and starting to scare me. Only homes with lots of room please.

address.street1: River Oaks Pky & Village Center Dr

item.name: Small Box Turtle
item.description: Cute little turtle for sale. This box turtle is easy to care for and just needs a good home.

item.name: Mexican Redkneed Tarantula
item.description: No, I am not reptile food! But if you like exotic reptiles, well maybe you would like me too? I promise not to bite you and turn you into spiderman, unless that is what you want. Perhaps you want to climb walls with me?

item.name: Large Box Turtle
item.description: Turtles are very nice creatures. This large Box Turtle is super fast. Well, compared to other turtles in the neighborhood, this is the Cheetah of turtles.

item.name: California Desert Tortoise
item.description: An endangered tortoise. We are lookng for a zoo to house this beautiful creature. It has a quite nice disposition and will let children pet its shell to discover the mysteries of biology.

item.name: Florida King Snake
item.description: This Florida King Snake is really nice. It may look spooky and scare your friends at first, but eventually they will learn to love this slippery snake.

item.name: Leopard Gecko
item.description: My little leopard gecko needs a new home. If you are interested in purchasing this gecko, I advise you to hurry as it is bound to sell fast.

item.name: Prehensile Tailed Skink
item.description: Long Tailed Prehensile Tailed Skink for sale. This is the longest tail I have ever seen on a lizard. It goes on for days. Notice the gloves? Be aware of the sharp claws when holding this lizard, even though she is very nice.

item.name: African Spurred Tortoise
item.description: This is not a turtle, it is an African Spurred Tortoise. It grows to get really large. Maybe you have a big yard and can really care for this tortoise? If so, now is your chance to buy it.

item.name: Box Turtle
item.description: This box turtle needs a new home. I am moving and unfortunately must sell all my animals.

item.name: Prehensile Tailed Skink
item.description: My lizard is really cool and all my school friends are really impressed when I bring it to show-and-tell. But, the other day at home, he escaped from his cage and it REALLY freaked my mom out. Now she is mad at me. Sigh, since I can not sell my Mom, please buy my lizard.

item.name: Leopard Gecko
item.description: Are you seeing spots in front of your eyes? No you are not sleepy. That is just the affect of my gecko and his beautiful spotted skin.

address.street1: River Oaks Pky & Village Center Dr

item.name: Guinea Pig
item.description: Oh no! I dont like snakes at all. Why am I here in this list surrounded by serpents? Help save me! Take me home to a nice warm cage with fresh newspaper.

item.name: Iron Dragon
item.description: Just look at this fierce beast. This is so tough its like a secret military weapon.

item.name: Green slider
item.description: This snake looks like a lizard! It must be rare since I have never seen one like it.

item.name: Green Iguana
item.description: This is one proud and tough lizard. He holds his head high in any circumstance.

item.name: Iguana
item.description: My iguana needs a home. His tail is really long. He is very nice.

item.name: Frog
item.description: This little green frog was rescued from the chef in the kitchen of a french restaurant. If I had not acted quickly, his legs would have been appetizers. Now for just a small fee you can buy him as your pet.
